name: Anting Along
description:
You are a lost ant looking for your way back home. Help fellow ants back to the colony and learn new abilities.

Controls;

WASD-  Move

Space- Jump

Z- Dash forward and break rocks

W + Space- Double Jump

Devlog:

Although I originally made this for the "Brackeys game jam", I still had fun making it and wanted to see it in a more finished state. For this game, I simply wanted more levels, mechanics than I had done before and I achieved that. I wish I had made more levels but I ran out of ideas and wanted to keep within the "Accountability jam" 1 month time limit.
